name.name: imcalc: Batch image calulations and transformations (SPM5/8/12)

software.description:
** Updated Nov 2017 ** Image maths and transformations with batch functionality for SPM5, SPM8, or SPM12; features include:

(1) Binarize: non-zero voxels, or to specific thresholds
(2) Pairwise operations: add, subtract, mean, min, max ...
(3) Create or split cluster images
(4) Create inter-subject agreement maps
(5) Statistical transformations: T-to-Z, Z-score calculation
(6) Create masks based on an image
(7) Replace zeros / NaNs
(8) Pad a bounding box with extra voxels

For **CURRENT VERSION** download and documentation, visit http://tools.robjellis.net/
